doc.field: Maria S. Brainerd Valentine's Day card
Maria S. Brainerd Valentine's Day card

Embossed, lace paper Valentine's Day card, with envelope, mailed to Maria S. Brainerd, 120 Sullivan Street, New York. For fuller details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
